name: Qatar Economy Class - Ultimate Long Haul Flight Review
description:
The ultimate test of just how good an airline is is not how blingy their first and business class cabin is but how well they treat their economy class passengers. 

And the ultimate test of economy is a long haul overnight flight.  

So that's just what I did for this Qatar Economy Class - Ultimate Flight Review. 

Join me as I board a Qatar Airways 777 in Adelaide Australia and fly all the way to Doha Qatar in economy class. 

What's the Qatar economy class seat like?  I'll show you. 
What's the Qatar Economy Class catering like?  I'll show.
What's the Qatar Economy Class service like? I'll show you. 
What's the Qatar Economy Class inflight entertainment like?  I'll show you. 

Then once you've watched this one check out my Qatar business Class Reviews including:

Qatar Q Suite:
Qatar's second best business class seat:
